    • confirm

      public boolean confirm​(PaymentMethod p)
      Confirmation of the reservation: modifies the ticket list in the performance if successful.
      Parameters:
      p - purchase method
      Returns:
      true if the confirmation is successful

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Cancels the reservation: modifies the ticket list in the performance

    • updateReservation

      public void updateReservation()
      Updates state reservation, checking whether it has expired. This method is to be called on every reservation every time a user logs in
